label: 紫苑色
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: The aster combination is defined variously as light purple with a green lining, purple with a brown lining, or brown with a yellowish-green lining.  It was worn at the beginning of autumn (p. 744).
